page.title: 19Law and order
page.content: In constrast to their neighbours the villages have relatively little crime. This does'nt mean it is a haven of purity as there are still cases of petty crime,burglary being the most frequent but on the whole the perpetraters come from outside the area.The days of the villages bobby are gone and policeman are generally only seen in emergency.The nearest police station is several miles away and the area is policed by a mobile force.Vandalism is much less as there are less young people to make mischief and also a lack of street lights in the villages means a lack of movement on winter nights.Although country people are noted for their watchfulness of strangers they are not very security conscious and are quite trusting,making them easier targets for travelling thieves.
